conversation.author: sfuhrer
conversation.body: `rep->current.cruising_speed = get_cruising_speed();` was missing on entry of a FW Orbit, thus always resetting the speed to the vehicle default.

issue_comments.author: sfuhrer
issue_comments.body:
> only concern is that it returns -1 if no cruising speed is present.. is this handled in the remainder of navigator and/or the fixed-wing controller?

Yes FW Pos control checks for >0 to use the cruising_speed setpoint.

reviews.author: tstastny
reviews.body: only concern is that it returns -1 if no cruising speed is present.. is this handled in the remainder of navigator and/or the fixed-wing controller?
